message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its high value and quality, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9500. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored specifically for you, considering the significant worth this product holds for you at $10000. I am confident it will meet and exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.
